events.summary: DeepMind Technologies founded in London by Demis Hassabis, Shane Legg, and Mustafa Suleyman
DeepMind raises seed funding from Horizons Ventures, Founders Fund (Peter Thiel, Elon Musk investors)
Facebook AI Research (FAIR) founded by Mark Zuckerberg, Yann LeCun recruited as founding director
Google announces TPU v1 development, first custom AI accelerator for inference workloads
OpenAI founded as nonprofit with $1 billion pledge from Sam Altman, Elon Musk, Greg Brockman, and others
AlphaGo defeats Lee Sedol 4-1 in Go, over 100 million viewers in Asia, establishing DeepMind's reputation
Google publicly reveals TPU v1, claims 15-30x better performance per watt than contemporary GPUs/CPUs
OpenAI announces partnership with NVIDIA for GPU computing, using DGX-1 systems
PyTorch 1.0 released by FAIR, becomes industry-standard deep learning framework
Google announces TPU v2 with training support and Cloud availability, reducing external GPU dependence
Yann LeCun transitions from FAIR Director to Chief AI Scientist at Meta
Elon Musk departs OpenAI board citing potential Tesla AI conflicts, reducing governance stability
Google announces TPU v3 with liquid cooling and pod architectures for large-scale training
OpenAI releases GPT-1 (117M parameters), establishing transformer language model research direction
Yann LeCun receives Turing Award alongside Yoshua Bengio and Geoffrey Hinton for deep learning work
AlphaFold wins CASP13 protein folding competition, demonstrating AI application to biology
OpenAI releases GPT-2 (1.5B parameters) with controversial staged release due to misuse concerns
OpenAI transitions from nonprofit to capped-profit structure (OpenAI LP), enabling commercial investment
Microsoft invests $1 billion in OpenAI, becomes exclusive cloud provider and commercialization partner
Microsoft Azure becomes OpenAI's exclusive cloud platform for training workloads
FAIR expands to approximately 400 researchers across global labs
OpenAI releases GPT-3 (175B parameters), establishes technical leadership in language models
Microsoft receives exclusive license to GPT-3 underlying technology, deepening Azure dependency
OpenAI releases DALL-E, demonstrating text-to-image generation capabilities
Anthropic founded by Dario Amodei, Daniela Amodei, and 7 other ex-OpenAI researchers citing safety concerns
Anthropic raises $124 million seed round from Jaan Tallinn, Dustin Moskovitz, Eric Schmidt
Google announces TPU v4 with 2x+ performance over v3, claims competitive with NVIDIA A100
OpenAI releases Codex, powering GitHub Copilot, first major commercial API product
Mustafa Suleyman placed on leave from DeepMind following workplace conduct investigation
Meta announces Research SuperCluster (RSC) with 6,080 NVIDIA A100 GPUs for AI training
Mustafa Suleyman leaves DeepMind to join Greylock Partners, later co-founds Inflection AI
OpenAI releases DALL-E 2 with dramatically improved image quality and commercial availability
Anthropic raises $580 million Series A including $500 million from FTX/Alameda Research
OpenAI faces initial copyright concerns as artists protest DALL-E training on their work
AlphaFold database expands to 200 million protein structures, freely available to researchers
Meta spins off PyTorch to independent PyTorch Foundation under Linux Foundation governance
US Commerce Department issues advanced chip export controls to China, affecting AI compute access
FTX collapses into bankruptcy, complicating Anthropic's $500M investment from Alameda
ChatGPT infrastructure strained, Azure capacity constraints visible during viral launch
ChatGPT launches as free research preview, reaches 1 million users in 5 days
Anthropic publishes Constitutional AI paper describing its AI training methodology
ChatGPT reaches 100 million monthly active users, fastest-growing consumer app in history
Microsoft invests additional $10 billion in OpenAI, total reaches ~$13 billion, valuation $29 billion
OpenAI launches ChatGPT Plus subscription at $20/month, first direct consumer revenue
Google rushes Bard AI chatbot announcement in response to ChatGPT, demo error causes $100B market cap drop
Microsoft integrates ChatGPT into Bing search, deepening Azure-OpenAI interdependence
Meta releases LLaMA (7B-65B parameters) under research license, model leaks via BitTorrent
Google invests $300 million in Anthropic for ~10% stake, first hyperscaler partnership
xAI incorporated in Nevada as public-benefit corporation by Elon Musk
OpenAI releases GPT-4 with multimodal capabilities, 40% more factual than GPT-3.5
Anthropic launches Claude 1.0 API with partners including Notion, Quora, DuckDuckGo
Google launches Bard publicly in US and UK, entering competitive chatbot market
Italy temporarily bans ChatGPT over privacy concerns, first major regulatory action
Google merges DeepMind and Google Brain into Google DeepMind under Demis Hassabis leadership
Italy lifts ChatGPT ban after OpenAI implements privacy controls, first regulatory resolution
Anthropic raises $450 million Series C at $4.1 billion valuation led by Spark Capital
Sam Altman testifies before US Senate on AI risks and regulation needs
Meta announces MTIA v1 custom AI accelerator chip manufactured on TSMC 7nm process
EU AI Act passes European Parliament with rules affecting high-risk AI systems
Anthropic launches Claude 2 with 100K token context, available to public via claude.ai
Elon Musk publicly announces xAI with team of ex-DeepMind and ex-OpenAI researchers
Meta releases Llama 2 with commercial license in partnership with Microsoft
OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta commit to White House voluntary AI safety standards
Google announces TPU v5e for cost-efficient AI workloads, 2.5x throughput per dollar vs v4
Meta reports severe GPU shortage impacting AI research roadmap
OpenAI announces enterprise tier with enhanced security and Azure Private Link integration
Anthropic publishes Responsible Scaling Policy v1.0 with AI Safety Levels framework
Amazon invests $1.25 billion in Anthropic, AWS becomes primary cloud partner
UK AI Safety Summit at Bletchley Park, frontier labs commit to safety testing protocols
Google commits additional $2 billion to Anthropic investment bringing total to $2.3 billion
President Biden signs Executive Order on AI requiring safety testing for powerful AI systems
Anthropic reaches approximately $1 billion annualized revenue run rate
xAI launches Grok 1.0 beta for X Premium+ subscribers with real-time X data access
OpenAI announces GPT-4 Turbo with 128K context, cuts API prices significantly
OpenAI board fires Sam Altman citing lack of candor, Mira Murati named interim CEO
~770 OpenAI employees sign letter demanding board resign, Ilya Sutskever expresses regret
Sam Altman returns as CEO with new board (Bret Taylor chair, Larry Summers, Adam D'Angelo)
Google announces TPU v5p with 8,960-chip pod configurations competitive with H100
Google DeepMind launches Gemini model family (Ultra, Pro, Nano) as flagship AI product
Gemini models available exclusively through Google Cloud, no third-party cloud support
EU AI Act achieves political agreement, includes GPAI rules affecting frontier models
New York Times sues OpenAI and Microsoft for copyright infringement over training data
OpenAI reaches approximately $2 billion annualized revenue run rate
OpenAI launches GPT Store marketplace for custom GPTs, expanding ecosystem
FTC opens inquiry into cloud-AI partnerships examining Microsoft-OpenAI, Google-Anthropic, Amazon-Anthropic
Meta orders 350,000 NVIDIA H100 GPUs (~$10.5 billion), largest single GPU order in history
FTC Chair Lina Khan calls for investigation into Microsoft-OpenAI partnership structure
Meta announces $30-37 billion CapEx guidance for 2024, signaling massive AI infrastructure build
Google Bard rebranded to Gemini, Gemini Advanced subscription launched at $20/month
Elon Musk files lawsuit against OpenAI and Sam Altman alleging breach of founding mission
Gemini 1.5 Pro announced with 1 million token context window, 10x GPT-4
Google releases Gemma open models built on Gemini research, expanding ecosystem
UK CMA opens inquiry into Google's Anthropic investment for potential competition concerns
Anthropic launches Claude 3 family (Opus, Sonnet, Haiku) with multimodal capabilities, outperforms GPT-4
xAI open-sources Grok-1 (314B parameter MoE) under Apache 2.0 license
WilmerHale investigation concludes OpenAI board acted in good faith during November crisis
Amazon invests additional $2.75 billion in Anthropic, total reaches $4 billion
Reports emerge of OpenAI exploring Oracle Cloud partnership to reduce Azure dependence
Meta announces MTIA v2 'Artemis' chip on 5nm process with 3.5x performance boost
Meta releases Llama 3 (8B, 70B) trained on 15 trillion tokens, largest open training run
OpenAI releases GPT-4o with omni-modal capabilities (text, audio, vision, video) at no extra cost
Ilya Sutskever departs OpenAI after nearly 10 years, later co-founds Safe Superintelligence Inc.
Jan Leike resigns from OpenAI safety team citing 'erosion of safety culture', joins Anthropic
OpenAI dissolves superalignment team following Jan Leike resignation
xAI raises $6 billion Series B at $24 billion valuation from Valor Equity, a]6z, others
xAI drops public-benefit corporation status, converts to standard for-profit
Greater Memphis Chamber announces xAI Colossus supercomputer project
OpenAI confirms Oracle Cloud partnership for AI infrastructure diversification
Anthropic releases Claude 3.5 Sonnet, outperforms larger Claude 3 Opus, introduces Artifacts feature
NVIDIA confirms xAI as strategic customer with accelerated H100 delivery
Anthropic commits to using AWS Trainium chips for future training workloads
Meta releases Llama 3.1 including 405B parameter model, first frontier-level open weights
Meta announces Llama 3.1 won't be released in EU due to 'unpredictable regulatory environment'
Meta announces testing of MTIA training chip variant for 2025/2026 deployment
US District Judge Mehta rules Google illegally monopolized search market in landmark antitrust case
OpenAI co-founder John Schulman announces departure to join Anthropic
Reports surface that Musk diverted NVIDIA GPUs from Tesla to xAI, raising governance concerns
Google Cloud announces Gemini API available through Vertex AI with GCP-exclusive features
xAI partners with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for additional compute capacity
xAI Colossus supercomputer launches with 100,000 H100 GPUs in 122 days, record build speed
Meta announces AMD MI300X support for Llama inference workloads
OpenAI releases o1 reasoning model ('Strawberry'), new category of AI for complex problem-solving
Meta releases Llama 3.2 with multimodal capabilities including vision models
Mira Murati, Bob McGrew, and Barret Zoph all depart OpenAI on same day, massive leadership exodus
OpenAI reaches 92% Fortune 500 penetration with enterprise customers
OpenAI raises $6.6 billion at $157 billion valuation from Microsoft, Thrive, NVIDIA
Demis Hassabis and John Jumper awarded Nobel Prize in Chemistry for AlphaFold work
Meta reports strong Llama API adoption but limited direct revenue from AI products
xAI benefits from reduced regulatory scrutiny compared to larger competitors
Claude Pro subscription reaches 2 million paid users
Google DeepMind researchers publish paper showing improved efficiency on TPU v5 vs NVIDIA H100
Anthropic launches Claude Computer Use capability, first frontier model for desktop navigation
Anthropic establishes AI safety commitments ahead of potential UK AI Safety Institute requirements
Google announces TPU v6 'Trillium' with 4.7x v5e performance and 67% better efficiency
ChatGPT Plus subscriber growth slowing as competition from Claude and Gemini intensifies
Gemini Advanced reaches 5 million subscribers globally
Meta confirms massive NVIDIA GPU order for next-gen Llama training, expands Oracle partnership
TVA approves 150MW power for xAI Colossus, environmental concerns over gas generators
xAI announces $6B funding round to accelerate Grok development and infrastructure
Amazon invests additional $4 billion in Anthropic, total reaches $8 billion
Gemini models exclusively available through Google Cloud, no third-party cloud support announced
Anthropic reportedly exploring custom ASIC development with Google for Claude training
X Premium+ with Grok reaches 10 million subscribers
OpenAI lobbying efforts intensify as Congress considers AI compute reporting requirements
Meta faces renewed FTC scrutiny over AI data practices and model training
FAIR reaches approximately 1,000 researchers across eight global locations
Meta announces Llama 4 will support multiple inference backends including AMD MI300X
xAI Colossus expands to 200,000 Hopper GPUs in 92 days, world's largest AI training cluster
xAI raises $6 billion Series C at $45 billion valuation
OpenAI launches Sora video generation model for ChatGPT Pro subscribers
xAI faces questions about Grok monetization as X platform ad revenue declines
Google DeepMind launches Gemini 2.0 with agentic capabilities and improved multimodal performance
xAI's Colossus cluster now operational with 100,000 NVIDIA H100 GPUs
Google announces TPU v6 production ramp, reducing external GPU dependence for DeepMind
OpenAI launches o3 reasoning model with breakthrough ARC-AGI performance (87.5% high-compute)
EU AI Act compliance requirements affecting Gemini deployment timelines in Europe
Llama reaches 650 million total downloads, averaging 1 million daily since February 2023
Anthropic raises $2B at $60B valuation amid strong enterprise demand for Claude
Google invests additional $1 billion in Anthropic, total Google investment exceeds $3 billion
Anthropic expands Google Cloud partnership while maintaining AWS Bedrock integration
OpenAI secures additional NVIDIA H100 allocation amid continued GPU constraints
OpenAI extends Azure partnership with expanded compute commitment through 2030
Meta announces $60-65 billion CapEx for 2025, new 2GW data center with 1.3 million GPUs planned
Trump administration announces Stargate Project: $500B AI infrastructure JV with Oracle, SoftBank
DeepSeek R1 release from Chinese lab sparks concerns about Chinese AI capabilities catching up
DeepSeek R1 release causes NVIDIA stock drop and questions about US AI infrastructure spending
OpenAI projects $12-13 billion revenue for full year 2025
Free Software Foundation classifies Llama license as 'nonfree', questioning open-source claims
xAI announces Microsoft Azure partnership for inference workloads
Anthropic reportedly exploring custom ASIC development with Google for Claude training
OpenAI closes $40 billion funding led by SoftBank ($30B), valuation reaches $300 billion
Anthropic raises $3.5 billion Series E at $61.5 billion valuation
Trump DOJ drops Biden-era proposals requiring Google to divest AI investments
xAI acquires X Corp (Twitter) in all-stock deal valuing xAI at $80B, X at $33B
Joelle Pineau, head of FAIR since 2017, announces departure from Meta
Meta releases Llama 4 with mixture-of-experts architecture (Scout, Maverick variants)
Meta withholds Llama 4 multimodal models from EU due to AI Act concerns
Google Workspace with Gemini reaches 10 million enterprise seats
Separate court rules Google violated antitrust laws in advertising technology
OpenAI establishes safety advisory board with external researchers following 2024 departures
Anthropic releases Claude 4 family with ASL-3 safety protections for Opus 4
Google announces TPU v7 'Ironwood', first inference-focused TPU with 42.5 exaflops capacity
Meta announces self-reliant AI infrastructure strategy, minimal external cloud dependence
OpenAI reaches $10 billion annualized revenue run rate
Colossus expands to 150,000 H100s + 50,000 H200s + 30,000 GB200s
Anthropic enterprise revenue reaches 80% of total, reducing consumer concentration risk
xAI releases Grok 4 (described as 'most intelligent model'), SuperGrok Heavy tier at $300/mo
xAI wins $200M DoD contract alongside Anthropic, Google, OpenAI
Grok generates antisemitic responses, xAI apologizes citing 'deprecated code'
Shelby County grants air permits for xAI Colossus amid environmental concerns
xAI raises $10 billion (mix of debt and equity)
OpenAI releases GPT-5 unifying multiple capabilities, reaching 70.9% on expert knowledge tasks
Igor Babuschkin, xAI Chief Engineer, departs company
Google Cloud TPU access expands to additional regions reducing single-point-of-failure risk
Anthropic reaches $5 billion annualized revenue run rate
Meta announces $600 billion AI infrastructure spending commitment through 2028
xAI enterprise tier launches with dedicated Grok instances for Fortune 500
Judge Mehta rejects Chrome divestiture but imposes 6-year oversight and data sharing requirements
Anthropic reaches $1.5 billion copyright settlement with authors, largest such resolution in US history
Anthropic blocks sales to China, Russia, Iran, North Korea for national security
Anthropic raises $13 billion Series F at $183 billion valuation
Anthropic releases Claude Sonnet 4.5 with improved reasoning and coding
OpenAI completes for-profit PBC restructuring: Foundation 26%, Microsoft 27%, employees 47%
OpenAI consumer revenue concentration at ~70% raises dependency concerns
Meta acquires chip startup Rivos for RISC-V architectural flexibility
Anthropic reaches $7 billion ARR with 10x year-over-year growth
OpenAI valuation reaches ~$500 billion following PBC restructuring
Anthropic projects $20-26 billion revenue for 2026
Google DeepMind releases Gemini 3.0 with 31.1% on ARC-AGI-2 benchmark (6x improvement)
xAI GSA OneGov deal approved at $0.42 per agency for 18 months
Anthropic releases Claude Opus 4.5 with 'Infinite Chats' eliminating context limitations
Yann LeCun announces departure from Meta after 12 years to found AI startup
Meta opens 30th data center (Beaver Dam, $1B+ investment)
Musk announces 30MW solar farm plans for Colossus facility
Joelle Pineau joins Cohere as Chief AI Officer after Meta departure
Llama-based applications exceed 85,000 derivatives on Hugging Face
ChatGPT reaches 800 million weekly active users with 15M+ paid subscribers
OpenAI profitability target remains 2029, raising runway concerns at current burn rate
xAI acquires third Colossus building, targeting 2 gigawatts compute capacity
xAI integrates with Pentagon GenAI.mil, targeting early 2026 deployment
Anthropic demonstrates multi-cloud failover between AWS and GCP for Claude inference
GPT-5.2 achieves 70.9% on expert knowledge benchmarks, significant improvement over GPT-5
Meta reports 600,000+ GPUs deployed across global data centers
Grok implicated in CSAM generation scandal, users prompted AI-generated child abuse images
OpenAI reportedly seeking $100 billion at $750-830 billion valuation
Google distribution deals limited to one-year terms under antitrust remedies
Microsoft retains 75% profit share until $13B investment recouped per original agreement
Anthropic signs term sheet for $10 billion at $350 billion valuation
Meta PyTorch Foundation announces 10 million downloads per month milestone
Nous Research's NousCoder-14B is an open-source coding model landing right in the Claude Code moment
OpenAI secures additional NVIDIA H100 allocation amid continued GPU constraints
xAI raises $20 billion Series E, valuation reaches approximately $230 billion
OpenAI extends Azure partnership with expanded compute commitment through 2030
Google’s Gemini to power Apple’s AI features like Siri
OpenAI signs deal, worth $10B, for compute from Cerebras
OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
OpenAI Invests in Sam Altman’s New Brain Tech Startup Merge Labs
Hands On With Anthropic’s Claude Cowork, an AI Agent That Actually Works
OpenAI and Anthropic are making their play for healthcare, and we’re not surprised
California AG sends Musk’s xAI a cease-and-desist order over sexual deepfakes
The AI healthcare gold rush is here
Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
Under Musk, the Grok disaster was inevitable
Claude Code costs up to $200 a month. Goose does the same thing for free.
Humans&, a ‘human-centric’ AI startup founded by Anthropic, xAI, Google alums, raised $480M seed round
Anthropic’s CEO stuns Davos with Nvidia criticism
Voice AI engine and OpenAI partner LiveKit hits $1B valuation
OpenAI is coming for those sweet enterprise dollars in 2026
The Download: chatbots for health, and US fights over AI regulation
‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
Anthropic reportedly upped its latest raise to $20B
What AI “remembers” about you is privacy’s next frontier
